DIIN.has: state - of - the - art interaction - based model

BiMPM and ESIM models.from sentence: Quora dataset : BiMPM and ESIM models without any sentence interaction information , and is very close to DIIN , the state - of - the - art interaction - based model , but we do n't any external knowledge in our method .
